casebody.data:
BIGELOW & DOWSE COMPANY et al., Creditors, Appellants, v. Harry N. GUTERMAN, Trustee, Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, First Circuit. April 18, 1929. No. 2351. Prank C. Gorman, of Boston, Mass., for appellants. Harry N. Guterman, of Boston, Mass., for appellee.

Before BINGHAM and ANDERSON, Circuit Judges, and MORRIS, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Order denying petition for appeal was entered.
